title: Honor capsule drop rate "month" meaning

embed.description: We're adding some bad luck protection to Honor Capsules to make their drop rate more reliable. We're also sharing the updated rules around drops because we found our lack of clarity disturbing. Here's how Honor Capsule drops work now:

body: "month is intended as" 28 days, 30 days? or is it actually the days of the current month?

replies.body: Historically a 'month' when referring to key fragments has been about 28 days from when you got your first key fragment.
